title: Dr. Oz LITERALLY Stinks, Long Standing Ovation = Bad Movie? 09.08.22
itunes:title: Dr. Oz LITERALLY Stinks, Long Standing Ovation = Bad Movie? 09.08.22
description:
In episode 1326, Jack and Miles are joined by writers, artists, and hosts of Baby Genius, Emily Heller and Lisa Hanawalt to discuss… Let’s check in with the Land of OZ, How Human Behavior Explains Crazy-Long Standing Ovations and more!

  1. Let’s check in with the Land of OZ
  2. Oz seeks to win over the MAGA faithful
  3. Clap Watch: Colin Farrell and The Banshees of Inisherin now lead with 13-minute standing ovation
  4. Florence Pugh and Olivia Wilde Keep Their Distance During 4-Minute Venice Standing Ovation for ‘Don’t Worry Darling’
  5. White Noise tragically opens in Venice to "a tepid 150-second standing ovation"
  6. The Longest Standing Ovations at Cannes, From 'Elvis' to 'Bowling for Columbine'
  7. From ‘Elvis’ to ‘Inglourious Basterds,’ These Are the Longest Cannes Standing Ovations of All Time
  8. When the Applause Just Won’t End

LISTEN: Mindgames by Ganzo

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
